master.title: Use this channel to post adds for your group content!
master.description:
You must be in a voice channel!
Post your adds in the format:
 `!lfg [famefarm|hellgate|gank] [description]`

fields.name: Example 1
fields.value: !lfg famefarm Need tank and 1 dps for T5 BBP random dungeons 900IP min

fields.name: Example 2
fields.value: !lfg gank Gank group leaving from BBP HO | max 10 people | bring 1000IP or higher gank builds

fields.name: Example 3
fields.value: !lfg hellgate Need partner for 2v2 HGs near Arthur"s Rest, I can run curse or holy healer

broadcast.title: This is a broadcast channel for the iloveBacon LFG Bot!
broadcast.description:
LFG posts that are made on the iLoveBacons server will be copied here.
Clicking on the link in the descriptions will let you join the group in a voice party!
Head over to iLoveBacons to make your own LFG posts!
